message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a great deal and will be very useful for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $170?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $140 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
